title: DJ Sona
body: I loved how the she played the music the whole time but my teammates could not hear it and I do not know if it is on purpose or accidental

replies.body: They haven't gotten all of her features working yet.
Yeah :D Like today/yesterday they just got the /g & /toggle working for form swapping.  She's got so many pieces that still haven't been added in there (like the summoner icons and stuff)

It's just too soft.

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/U02Q0mtT-dj-sona-music-volume

Bump this thread so Riot can fix it.
She's been released and this is still an issue.  Option to "Opt-in" is not showing up.
Your teammates have to opt into listening to DJ Sona's music by pulling up the scoreboard, and hitting the button next to Sona's icon.
Yup, this is correct. Ally players need to opt in to the music. (Enemies won't be able to hear it, and won't have the option.)
O ok yesterday my teammates did not get the option
You need to hold tab, and it appears next to Sona's icon on the left hand side of the screen (not on the scorecard, on the very far left.)
btw. Did her icons hit PBE today yet?? So we can check out the profile banners.
They're on PBE, however, currently, if you've already bought her, the icons won't be granted. You'd need to refund and re-buy. D:
Really o.o Wow.... Would I have to wait awhile to get them on its own, or do I have to literally re-buy or never get them??

They're not available aside from unlocking the skin.

I'm not sure what the case is for those who already bought her, since it's PBE. We're looking into it.

Oh, okay. Well on PBE, I have the same username as this. I will wait a bit longer. Keep me updated on it, and let me know if those who already bought it will definitely have to re-buy or not. =P Not sure if I want to use a refund already for 1 IP. lol
